Collar squaller
 




Adrian Peterson says his shoulder is 'about 90 percent' healthy.  (AP)



    

    

      
      He simply fascinates Charley 
      Casserly. He's a top 10, no, top 
      five pick, Pete Prisco says. But talk of Adrian 
      Peterson's clavicle just won't take a sabbatical and it 
      has teams worried, Clark Judge says.  A.P. 
      responds

 Miller: Iwamura becomes key piece for rising Rays


    

      
      Japanese import Akinori Iwamura is bringing skills and energy to a franchise 
      that needs both. His DL detour is a bummer, but these Rays 
      have the young talent to hang in.
